txt.en: The trail of Orc Prints leads towards TBD
Speak with Lhôs-uksa-Wôt
Eating in the glade, the White Stag does not yet notice you
The Wose motions for you to follow the prints. Her face remains expressionless but her movement shows signs of excitement now that you have the White Stag's trail.
You and Lhôs-uksa-Wôt spot some fresh hoofprints. The Wose beckons you near
White Stag prints may be found somewhere in the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should search the forest for White Stag prints.
Speak with Lhôs-uksa-Wôt
The White Stag can be found in the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should approach the White Stag.
Lhôs-uksa-Wôt can be found near the White Stag.\n\nYou should speak with Lhôs-uksa-Wôt.
The hunt for the White Stag continues
The Wose motions for you to approach the White Stag. Through hand gestures she seems to say that she believes in your skills with all creatures.
The White Stag continues to quietly eat in the glade
The hoofprints go further into the woods
Approach the White Stag
The White Stag runs off but a beautiful glowing flower appears where the White Stag had been
Lhôs-uksa-Wôt can be found near the White Stag prints.\n\nYou should speak with Lhôs-uksa-Wôt.
Lhôs-uksa-Wôt, an expert tracker, seeks your help in finding a legendary White Stag.
The White Stag can be found somewhere in the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should follow the trail of hoofprints to find the White Stag.
Hunt for the White Stag
Follow the White Stag prints
Search the woods of Taur Drúadan for hoofprints

The Wose does not speak Westron but beckons you closer. She holds up a carving of a deer that looks like a White Stag. Through hand gestures, it seems the Wose seeks a White Stag to bring luck to the village. She wants you to join her on the hunt.
